Author: PartyTimeSexyDisco
Text: I second the upcycling idea! I'm getting a sewing machine tomorrow and I'm gonna be making various bags out of some old clothes and altering stuff that's too big to fit me better! It's really fun and you can even make cheap gifts for ppl this way ðŸ˜Š

Author: gypsy_traveler_soul
Text: Upcycling them could be an option,  I turned some super cute shirts into a hippie type dress, I've also made my daughter some cute play dresses out of (oh god I'm over 30 I can't ever wear that) club clothes from the way back of my closet. I even turned a bunch of sweaters into one of those cool hooded patchwork dresses you see sometimes.
